page.title: 07BROADBRIDGE HEATH SPORTS-NEW
page.content: The existing sports centre huts are to be demolished and an indoor centre built at Broadbridge Heath.The present Clubs will be rehoused.There will be an{ice rink, swimming pool, {tennis and squash courts and a gym. The development is a{joint council {and private venture}and it is anticipated that 300,000 people will use it.As a result the present sports facilities in Horsham will be turned into community centres as there will not be so much demand for them. Broadbridge Heath has been chosen for development because the Park area in Horsham is covenanted. Also,it has better{access and communication than other proposed sites.The centre will cost nearly{20 million pounds}and work will take 18 months beginning at the end of 1985.The new sports is welcomed by the local community.
